original_text: And the vessel he was making of clay was spoiled in the potter's hand, and he reworked it into another vessel, as it seemed good to the potter to do.
korean_text: 진흙으로 만든 그릇이 토기장이의 손에서 터지매 그가 그것으로 자기 의견에 좋은 대로 다른 그릇을 만들더라

sentences.original_text: And the vessel he was making of clay was spoiled
and he reworked it into another vessel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 다른 그릇으로 다시 만들었고

sentences.original_text: as it seemed good to the potter to do.
